verses.verse: Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the heads<WH7218> of the tribes<WH4294> of the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "This is the thing<WH1697> which Yahweh<WH3068> has commanded.<WH6680>

When a man<WH376> vows<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> to Yahweh,<WH3068> or swears<WH7650> an oath<WH7621> to bind<WH631> his soul<WH5315> with a bond,<WH632> he shall not break<WH2490> his word;<WH1697> he shall do<WH6213> according to all that proceeds<WH3318> out of his mouth.<WH6310>
"Also when a woman<WH802> vows<WH5087> a vow<WH5088> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and binds<WH631> herself by a bond,<WH632> being in her father<WH1>'s house,<WH1004> in her youth,<WH5271>

and her father<WH1> hears<WH8085> her vow,<WH5088> and her bond<WH632> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul,<WH5315> and her father<WH1> holds his peace<WH2790> at her;<WH5088> then all her vows shall stand,<WH6965> and every bond<WH632> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul<WH5315> shall stand.<WH6965>

But if her father<WH1> disallow<WH5106> her in the day<WH3117> that he hears,<WH8085> none of her vows,<WH5088> or of her bonds<WH632> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul,<WH5315> shall stand:<WH6965> and Yahweh<WH3068> will forgive<WH5545> her,<WH1> because her father disallowed her.<WH5106>
"If she has a husband,<WH376> while her vows<WH5088> are on her,<WH4008> or the rash utterance of her lips,<WH8193> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul,<WH5315>

and her husband<WH376> hears<WH8085> it,<WH2790> and hold his peace at her in the day<WH3117> that he hears<WH8085> it;<WH5088> then her vows shall stand,<WH6965> and her bonds<WH632> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul<WH5315> shall stand.<WH6965>

But if her husband<WH376> forbids<WH5106> her in the day<WH3117> that he hears<WH8085> it,<WH4008> then he shall make void her vow which is on her, and the rash utterance of her lips,<WH8193> with which she has bound<WH631> her soul:<WH5315> and Yahweh<WH3068> will forgive her.<WH5545>
"But the vow<WH5088> of a widow,<WH490> or of her who is divorced,<WH1644> everything with which she has bound<WH631> her soul,<WH5315> shall stand against her.<WH6965>
"If she vowed<WH5087> in her husband<WH376>'s house,<WH1004> or bound<WH631> her soul<WH5315> by a bond<WH632> with an oath,<WH7621>

and her husband<WH376> heard<WH8085> it,<WH2790> and held his peace at her,<WH5106> and didn't disallow her;<WH5088> then all her vows shall stand,<WH6965> and every bond<WH632> with which she bound<WH631> her soul<WH5315> shall stand.<WH6965>

But if her husband<WH376> made<WH6565> them null and void<WH6565> in the day<WH3117> that he heard<WH8085> them,<WH4161> then whatever proceeded out of her lips<WH8193> concerning her vows,<WH5088> or concerning the bond<WH632> of her soul,<WH5315> shall not stand:<WH6965> her husband<WH376> has made them void;<WH6565> and Yahweh<WH3068> will forgive her.<WH5545>
Every vow,<WH5088> and every binding<WH632> oath<WH7621> to afflict<WH6031> the soul,<WH5315> her husband<WH376> may establish<WH6965> it,<WH376> or her husband may make it void.<WH6565>

But if her husband<WH376> altogether<WH2790> hold his peace<WH2790> at her from day<WH3117> to day,<WH3117> then he establishes<WH6965> all her vows,<WH5088> or all her bonds,<WH632> which are on her:<WH6965> he has established them,<WH2790> because he held his peace at her in the day<WH3117> that he heard them.<WH8085>
But if he shall make<WH6565> them null and void<WH6565> after<WH310> that he has heard<WH8085> them,<WH5375> then he shall bear her iniquity.<WH5771>"

These are the statutes,<WH2706> which Yahweh<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> between a man<WH376> and his wife,<WH802> between a father<WH1> and his daughter,<WH1323> being in her youth,<WH5271> in her father<WH1>'s house.<WH1004>
